Translations.Text: Yeh log kis cheez ke baarey mei puch-gajj kar rahe hain
Kya us badi khabar ke baarey mein
Jiske mutaaliq yeh mukhtalif che-mei-goiyan (disagreement) karne mein lagey huey hain
Hargiz nahin an-qareeb inhein maloom ho jayega
Haan hargiz nahin, an-qareeb inhein maloom ho jayega
Kya yeh waqiya nahin hai ke humne zameen ko farsh banaya
Aur pahadon ko mekhon(pegs) ki tarah gaad diya
Aur tumhein (mardon aur auraton ke) jodon ki shakal mein paida kiya
Aur tumhari neend ko baaisey sukoon banaya
Aur raat ko purdah posh
Aur din ko muaash ka waqt banaya
Aur Tumharey upar saat mazboot aasman qayam kiye
Aur ek nihayat roshan aur garm chirag paida kya
Aur baadalon se lagatar baarish barsayi
Taa-ke iske zariye se galla(grain) aur sabzi
Aur ghaney baagh ugaye
Beshak faisley ka din ek mukarrar waqt hai
Jis roz soor mei phook maar di jayegi tum fauj dar fauj nikal aaogey
Aur aasmaan khol diya jayega hatta ke woh darwaze hi darwaze ban kar reh jayega
Aur pahad chalaye jayenge yahan tak ke woh saraab(mirage) ho jayenge
Dar haqeeqat jahannum ek ghaat(ambush) hai
Sarkashon ka thikana
Jismein woh muddaton padey rahengey
Uske andar kisi thandak aur peene ke qabil kisi cheez ka maza woh na chakhengey
kuch milega to bas garam paani aur zakhmon ka dho-wan(peep)
(Unke kartuton) ka bharpur badla
Woh kisi hisab ki tawakku na rakhte thay
Aur hamari aayat ko unhon ne bilkul jhutla diya tha
Aur haal yeh tha ke humne har cheez gin gin kar likh rakkhi thi
Ab chakho maza, Hum tumhare liye azaab ke siwa kisi cheez mei hargiz izafa na karengey
Yakeenan muttakiyon(pious) ke liye kamrani ka ek Muqaam hai
Baagh aur angur
Aur naukhez humsin ladkiyan
Aur jhalakte huey jaam
Wahan koi lagv(vain) aur jhuthi baat woh na sunengey
Jazaa aur kafi inaam tumharey Rubb ki taraf se
Us nihayat meharban khuda ki taraf se jo zameen aur aasmaano ka aur inke darmiyan ki har cheez ka malik hai jiske samney kisi ko bolne ka yara nahin
Jis roz rooh aur malaika saff basta khade hongey. Koi na bolega siwaye uske jisey Rehman ijazat de aur jo theek baat kahey
Woh din bar-haqq hai, ab jiska jee chahey apne Rubb ki taraf palatne ka rasta ikhtiyar karle
Humne tum logon ko us azaab se dara diya hai jo qareeb aa laga hai. Jis roz aadmi woh sab kuch dekh lega jo uske hathon ne aagey bheja hai, aur kafir pukar uthega ke kaash mai khaaq(mitti) hota
Kasam hai un (Farishton) ki jo doob kar khinchte hain
aur aahistagi se (gently) nikaal le jataey hain
Aur (un farishton ki jo qayinaat mein) tezi se tairtey phirtay hain
phir (hukum baja laane mein) sabqat karte hain
phir (ehkam-ilahi ke mutabiq) maamlaat ka intizam chalate hain
Jis roz hila marey ga zalzalay ka jhatka
Aur uske pichey ek aur jhatka padega
Kuch dil hongey jo us roz khauf se kaanp rahey hongey
Nigahein unki sehmi(downcast) hui hogi
Yeh log kehte hain “Kya waqai hum palta kar phir wapas laaye jayenge?”
“Kya jab hum khokli boseeda (hollow and rotten) haddiyan ban chuke hongey?”
Kehne lagey “yeh wapsi to phir badey ghatey(nuksan) ki hogi”
Halaanke yeh bas itna kaam hai ke ek zoar ki daant padegi
Aur yakayk yeh khule maidan mein maujood hongey
Kya tumhein Moosa ke qissey ki khabar pahunchi hai
Jab uske Rubb ne usey Tuwa ke muqaddas wadi(valley) mein pukara tha
Ke Firaun ke paas ja, woh sarkash ho gaya hai
Aur ussey keh, kya tu iske liye tayyar hai ke pakeezgi ikhtiyar karey
Aur mai terey Rubb ki taraf teri rehnumai karoon to (uska) khauf terey andar paida ho?”
Phir Moosa ne (Firaun ke paas ja kar) usko badi nishani dikhai
Magar usne jhutla diya aur na mana
Phir chaal baaziyan karne ke liye palta
Aur logon ko jama karke usne pukaar kar kaha
“Main tumhara sabse bada Rubb hoon”
Aakhir-e-kaar Allah ne usey aakhirat aur duniya ke azaab mei pakad liya
Dar haqeeqat is mein badi ibrat hai har us shaks ke liye jo darey
Kya tum logon ki takhleeq(paidaish) zyada sakht kaam hai ya aasmaan ki? Allah ne usko banaya
Uski chhat(ceiling) khoob unchi uthayi phir uska tawazun qayam kiya(proportioned it)
Aur uski raat dhaanki aur uska din nikala
Iske baad zameen ko usne bichaya
Uske andar se uska paani aur chara nikala
Aur pahad usmein gaadh diye
Saaman-e-zeist(provision) ke taur par tumharay liye aur tumharey maweshion ke liye
Phir jab woh hungama-e-azeem barpa hoga
Jis roz Insan apna sab kiya dhara yaad karega
Aur har dekhne wale ke samney dozak khol kar rakh di jayegi
To jisne sarkashi(transgress) ki thi
Aur dunya ki zindagi ko tarjeeh di thi
dozakh hi uska thikana hogi
Aur jisne apne Rubb ke samney khade honay ka khauf kiya tha aur nafs ko buri khwaishaat se baaz rakha tha
Jannat uska thikana hogi
Yeh log tumse puchte hain ke aakhir woh ghadi kab aakar thehre gi
Tumhara kya kaam ke us ka waqt batao
Us ka ilm to Allah par khatm hai
Tum sirf khabardar karne waley ho har us shaks ko jo uska khauff karey
Jis roz yeh log usey dekh lengey to inhein yun mehsoos hoga ke (yeh duniya mein ya halat-e-mout mei) bas ek din ke pichle pehar ya aglay pehar tak thehrey hai
[The prophet] Tursh-rooh (frowned) hua aur berukhi barti
Is baat par ke woh andha us ke paas aa gaya
Tumhe kya khabar, shayad woh sudhar jaye
ya naseehat par dhyaan de aur naseeat karna us ke liye nafea(faiydamand) ho
Jo shaks be-parwahi baratta hai
Uski taraf to tum tawajjuh karte ho
Halaanke agar wo na sudhrey to tum par uski kya zimmedari hai
Aur jo khud tumharey paas dauda aata hai
Aur woh darr raha hota hai
Usse tum berukhi barat-tey ho
Hargiz nahin yeh to ek naseehat hai
jiska jee chahey isey qabool karey
Yeh aisey saheefon mein darj hai jo mukarram hain
Buland martaba hain, pakeeza hain
muazzaz aur neik kaatibon ke
haathon mein rehete hain
Laanat ho Insan par kaisa sakht munkir-e-haq (denies the Truth) hai yeh
Kis cheez se Allah ne isey paida kiya hai
Nutfa ki ek boondh se Allah ne isey paida kiya phir iski taqdeer muqarrar ki
Phir iske liye zindagi ki raah aasan ki
Phir isey maut di aur qabr mei pahunchaya
Phir jab chahey woh isey dobara utha khada karey
Hargiz nahi, isney woh farz ada nahi kiya jiska Allah ne isey hukum diya tha
Phir zara insaan apni khuraak(khane/food) ko dekhe
Humne khoob paani lundhaya(poured)
Phir zameen ko ajeeb tarah phada
phir us ke andar ugaye galley(grain)
Aur angoor aur tarkariyan
Aur zaitoon aur khajoorein
Aur ghaney baagh(orchards)
Aur tarah tarah ke phal aur chaarey
Tumharey liye aur tumharey maweshion(cattles) ke liye saman-e-zeist(provision )ke taur par
Aakhir-e-kaar jab woh kaan behrey kar deney wali aawaz buland hogi
Us roz aadmi apne bhai
Aur apni maa aur apne baap
Aur apni biwi aur apni aulad se bhagega
Unmein har shaks par us din aisa waqt aa padega ke usay apne siwa kisi ka hosh na hoga
Kuch chehrey us roz damak rahe hongey
Hashash bashash aur khush o khurram hongey
Aur kuch chehron par uss roz khaak(dust) udd rahi hogi
Aur kalons(darkness) chayi hui hogi
Yahi kafir o fajir (unbelivers and wicked) log hain
Jab Suraj lapeit diya jayega
Aur jab taarey bikhar jayenge
Aur jab pahad chalaye jayenge
Aur jab dus mahine ki hamila ountniyan (she-camels) apne haal par chod di jayengi
Aur jab jungli jaanwar sameth kar ikhattey kar diye jayenge
Aur jab samandar bhadka diye jayenge
Aur jab jaane (Jismon se) jodh di jayengi
Aur jab zinda gaadi hui(buried) ladki se pucha jayega
ke woh kis kasoor mei mari gayi
Aur jab aamal-naame(scrolls of deeds) kholey jayenge
Aur jab aasman ka purda hata diya jayega
Aur jab Jahannam dehkayi jayegi
Aur jab Jannat qareeb le aayi jayegi
Us waqt har shaks ko maloom ho jayega ke woh kya lekar aaya hai
Pas nahin main kasam khata hoon
Palatne aur chup janey wale taaron ki
Aur Raat ki jabke woh ruksat hui
Aur subah ki jabke usne saans liya
Yeh fil waqea ek buzurg paigam-bar ka qaul(word) hai
Jo badi tawanai (might) rakhta hai, Arsh waley ke yahan buland martaba hai
Wahan uska hukum mana jata hai, Woh ba-aitamad (trustworthy) hai
Aur (aey ehle Makkah) tumhara rafeeq(companion) majnoon(mad) nahin hai
Usne us paigambar ko roshan ufaq (clear horizon) par dekha hai
Aur woh gaib (ke is ilam ko logon tak pahunchane) ke maamle mei bakheel nahin hai
Aur yeh kisi shaitan-e-mardood ka qaul nahin hai
Phir tum log kidhar chaley ja rahey ho
Yeh to saarey jahan walon ke liye ek naseehat hai
Tum mein se har us shaks ke liye jo raah-e-raast par chalna chahta ho
Aur tumharey chahney se kuch nahin hota jab tak Allah Rabb-ul-Aalameen na chahey
Jab Aasman phat jayega
Aur jab taarey bikhar jayengey
Aur jab samandar phaad diye jayengey
Aur jab qabrein khol di jayengi
Us waqt har shaks ko uska agla pichla sab kiya dhara maloom ho jayega
Aey insaan kis cheez ne tujhey apne uss Rubb-e-kareem ki taraf se dhoke mein daal diya
Jisne tujhey paida kiya, tujhey nek-suk se durust kiya(shaped you), tujhe mutanasib(well-proportioned) banaya
Aur jis surat mein chaha tujhko jodh kar tayyar kiya
Hargiz nahin balke (asal baat yeh hai ke) tumlog jaza-o-saza ko jhutlate ho
Halaanke tumpar nigraan muqarrar hain
Aisey muazzaz kaatib
Jo tumharey har fail(amal) ko jantey hain
Yaqeenan neik log mazey mei hongey
Aur beshak badkar log jahannam me jayenge
Jaza ke din woh is mein daakhil hongey
Aur us se hargiz gayab na ho sakengey
Aur tum kya jaante ho ke woh jaza ka din kya hai
Haan tumhein kya khabar ke woh jaza ka din kya hai
Yeh woh din hai jab kisi shaks ke liye kuch karna kisi ke bas mei na hoga, faisla us din bilkul Allah ke ikhtiyar mein hoga
Tabahi hai dandi maarne walon ke liye
Jinka haal yeh hai ke jab logon se letey hai to pura pura letey hai
Aur jab unko naap kar ya toal kar dete hai to unhein ghata dete hai
Kya yeh log nahin samajhte ke ek badey din
Yeh utha kar laaye jaaney waley hain
Uss din jabke sab log Rabb-ul-Aalamin ke samney khadey hongey
Hargiz nahin, yaqeenan badkaaron ka naam-e- aamal qaid-khane ke daftar mei hai
Aur tumhey kya maloom ke woh qaid-khaney ka daftar kya hai
Ek kitaab hai likhi hui
Tabahi hai us roz jhutlane walon ke liye
Jo roz-e-jaza ko jhutlatay hain
Aur usey nahin jhutlata magar har woh shaks jo hadd se guzar janey wala bad-amal hai
Usey jab hamari ayaat sunayi jaati hain to kehta hai yeh to agley waqton ki kahaniyan hai
Hargiz nahin, balke darasal in logon ke dilon par inke burey aamal ka zang(rust) chadh gaya hai
Hargiz nahin bil yaqeen us roz yeh apne Rubb ki deed(deedar) se mehroom rakhey jayenge
Phir yeh jahannum mein jaa padenge
Phir insey kaha jayega ke yeh wahi cheez hai jisey tum jhutlaya karte thay
Hargiz nahin, beshak neik aadmion ka naam-e-aamal buland paya logon ke daftar mein hai
Aur tumhein kya khabar ke kya hai woh buland paya logon ka daftar
Ek likhi hui kitaab hai
Jiski nigeh-daasht muqarrab farishtay karte hain
Beshak neik log badey mazey mein hongey
Unchi masnadon(couches) par baithay nazarey kar rahey hongey
Unke chehron par tum khushhaali ki raunak mehsoos karogey
Unko nafees tareen sarband sharaab pilayi jayegi jispar mushk ki mohar(seal) lagi hogi
Jo log dusron par baazi le jana chahtey hon woh is cheez ko haasil karne mei baazi le jane ki koshish karein
Us sharaab mei tasneem ki aamezish(mixture) hogi
Yeh ek chasma hai jiske paani ke saath muqarrab log sharaab piyengey
Mujrim log duniya mein imaan laane walon ka mazaak udate thay
Jab unke paas se guzarte to aankhein maar maar kar unki taraf isharey karte thay
Apne gharon ki taraf palat-tey to mazey letey huey palat-tey thay
Aur jab unhein dekhte to kehte thay ke yeh behke huey log hain
Halaanke woh un par nigran banakar nahin bhejey gaye thay
Aaj imaan laane waley kuffar par hans rahay hai
Masnadon par baithey huey unka haal dekh rahey hain
Mil gaya na kafiron ko un harkaton ka sawab jo woh kiya karte thay
Jab aasman phatt jayega
Aur apne Rubb kay famaan ki tameel karega aur uske liye haq yahi hai (ke apne Rubb ka hukum maney)
Aur jab zameen phaila di jayegi
Aur jo kuch uske andar hai usey bahar phenk kar khaali ho jayegi
Aur apne Rubb ke hukum ki tameel karegi aur uske liye haq yahi hai (kay uski tameel karey)
Aey insaan tu kashaan kashaan apne Rubb ki taraf chala ja raha hai(striving unto your Lord) aur ussey milney wala hai
Phir jiska naam-e-aamal uske seedhey haath mei diya gaya
Ussey halka hisaab liya jayega
Aur woh apne logon ki taraf khush khush paltega
Raha woh shaks jiska naam-e-aamal us ki peeth ke pichey diya jayega
To woh maut ko pukarega
Aur bhadakti hui aag mei ja padega
Woh apne ghar walon mein magan tha
Usne samjha tha ke usey kabhi palatna nahin hai
Palatna kaise na tha, uska Rubb uske kartoot dekh raha tha
Pas nahin mai kasam khata hon shafaq(twilight) ki
Aur raat ki aur jo kuch woh sameith leti hai
Aur chaand ki jabke woh maah-e-kaamil (full) ho jata hai
Tumko zaroor darja ba darja ek haalat se dusri halat ki taraf guzarte chalay jana hai
Phir in logon ko kya ho gaya hai ke yeh imaan nahin laatey
Aur jab Quran inke samney pada jata hai to sajda nahin karte
Balke yeh munkireen to ulta jhutlatay hain
Halaanke jo kuch yeh (apne naam-e-aamal mein) jama kar rahey hain Allah usey khoob janta hai
Lihaza inko dardnaak azaab ki basharat dedo
Albatta jo log imaan le aaye hain aur jinho ne neik aamal kiye hain unke liye kabhi khatam na honay wala ajar hai
Kasam hai mazboot qalon waley (impregnable castles )aasman ki
Aur us din ki jiska wada kiya gaya hai
Aur dekhnay walay ki aur dekhi janey wali cheez ki
kay maarey gaye gaddey(pit) waley
uss gaddey(pit) waley] jis mei khoob bhadakte huey indhan ki aag thi
jabke woh us gaddey ke kinare par baithay huey thay
Aur jo kuch woh imaan laney walon ke saath kar rahey thay usey dekh rahey thay
Aur un ehley imaan se unki dushmani iske siwa kisi wajah se na thi ke woh us khuda par imaan le aaye thay jo zabardast aur apni zaat mei aap mahmood(praiseworthy) hai
Jo aasmano aur zameen ki sultanat ka maalik hai, aur woh khuda sab kuch dekh raha hai
Jin logon ne momin mardon aur auraton par zulm o sitam toda aur phir ussey taib na huey, yaqeenan unke liye jahannum ka azaab hai aur unke liye jalaye janey ki saza hai
Jo log imaan laaye aur jinho ne neik amal kiye yaqeenan unke liye jannat ke baagh hain jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi, yeh hai badi kamyabi
Dar haqeeqat tumharey Rubb ki pakad badi sakht hai
Wahi pehli baar paida karta hai aur wahi dobara paida karega
Aur woh bakshne wala hai, mohabbat karne wala hai
Arsh ka maalik hai, buzurg-o-bartar hai
Aur jo kuch chahey kar daalney wala hai
Kya tumhey lashkaron ki khabar pahunchi hai
Firoun aur samood (ke lashkaron) ki
Magar jinho ne kufr kiya hai woh jhutlaney mein lagey huey hain
Halaanke Allah ne unko gherey mein le rakha hai
(unke jhutlaney se iss quran ka kuch nahin bigadta) balkey yeh quran buland paya hai
Us loah mei (naqsh hai) jo mehfooz hai
Kasam hai aasmaan ki aur raat ko namudaar honay wale ki
Aur tum kya jaano kay woh raat ko namudaar honay wala kya hai
Chamakta hua tara
koi jaan aisi nahin hai jiske upar koi nigehbaan na ho
Phir zara Insan yahi dekh le ke woh kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
Ek uchalne wale pani se paida kiya gaya hai
Jo peet aur seeney ki haddiyon kay darmiyan se nikalta hai
Yaqeenan woh (khaliq) usey dobara paida karne par qadir hai
Jis roz poshida asraar ki jaanch padtal hogi
Us waqt Insan ke paas na khud apna koi zoar hoga aur na koi uski madad karne wala hoga
Kasam hai baarish barsane waley aasman ki
Aur (nabataat ugte waqt) phatt jane wali zameen ki
Yeh ek jachi-tuli baat hai
Hasi mazak nahin hai
yeh log kuch chalein chal rahe hain
Aur mai bhi ek chaal chal raha hoon
Pas chodh do aey nabi, in kafiron ko ek zara ki zara in ke haal par chod do
(Aey nabi) Apne Rubb-e-bartar kay naam ki tasbeeh karo
Jisne paida kiya aur tanasub qayam kiya (then proportioned it)
Jisne taqdeer banayi phir raah dikhayi
Jisne nabataat(pasture) ugayi
Phir unko siyah kuda karkat bana diya
Hum tumhey padhwa dengey phir tum nahin bhuloge
Siwaye uske jo Allah chahey.Woh zahir ko bhi jaanta hai aur jo kuch posheeda(hidden) hai usko bhi
Aur hum tumhein aasaan tarikey ki sahoolat dete hain
lihaza tum naseehat karo agar naseehat nafey(faiydamand) ho
Jo shaks darta hai wo naseehat qabool karlega
Aur ussey guraiz karega woh intehayi bad-bakht
Jo badi aag mei jayega
phir na usmein marega aur na jiyega
Falah paa gaya woh jisne pakizgi ikhtiyar ki
Aur apne Rubb ka naam yaad kiya phir namaz padhi
Magar tumlog duniya ki zindagi ko tarjeeh detay ho
halaanke aakhirat behtar hai aur baqi rehne wali hai
Yahi baat pehle aaey huey saheefon(scriptures) mei bhi kahi gayi thi
Ibrahim aur Moosa ke saheefon mein
Kya tumhein us chaa janey wali aafat ki khabar pahunchi hai
Kuch chehrey us roz khauff zada hongey
Sakht mashakkat kar rahe hongey
Thakey jatey hongey, shadeed aag mei jhulas rahe hongey
khaultey(boiling) huey chashmey(spring) ka paani unhei peene ko diya jaeyga
khar-dar(kaante-daar) sukhi ghaans ke siwa koi khana unke liye na hoga
Jo na mota karey na bhook mitaye
kuch chehrey us roz ba-raunak hongey
Apne kar-guzari par khush hongey
Aali muqaam jannat mein hongey
koi behuda baat wahan na sunengey
Usmein chasmey rawan hongey
Uske andar unchi masnadein hongi
Sagar rakhey huey hongey
gaon takiyon(cushions arrayed) ke qatarein lagi hongi
Aur nafees farsh bichey huey hongey
(yeh log nahin mantey) to kya yeh unton ko nahin dekhtey ke kaisey banaye gaye
Asman ko nahin dekhte ke kaise uthaya gaya
Pahadon ko nahin dekhtey ke kaisey jamaye gaye
Aur zameen ko nahin dekhtey ke kaisey bichayi gayi
Acha to ( aey nabi) nasihat kiye jao, tum bas nasihat hi karne wale ho
kuch inpar jabr karne wale nahin ho
Albatta jo shaks mooh modega aur inkar karega
To Allah usko bhaari saza dega
In logon ko palatna hamari taraf hi hai
Phir inka hisab lena hamare hi zimmey hai
Kasam hai fajr ki
Aur dus raaton ki
Aur jufft(even) aur taaq(odd) ki
Aur Raat ki jabke woh ruksat ho rahi ho
kya ismein kisi sahib-e-aqal ke liye koi kasam hai
Tumne dekha nahin ke tumhare Rubb ne kya bartao kiya
Unchey sutuno waley Aad-e-iram kay saath
Jinke manind koi qaum duniya kay mulkon mein paida nahin ki gayi thi
Aur Samood ke saath jinhon ne wadi mei chattane tarashi thi
Aur mekhon waley Firoun kay saath
Yeh woh log (thay) jinhone duniya kay mulkon mein badi sarkashi ki thi
Aur inmein bahut fasaad failaya tha
Aakhir-e-kaar tumhare Rubb ne inpar azaab ka koda barsa diya
Haqeeqat yeh hai kay tumhara Rubb ghaath(watchful) lagaye huey hai
Magar Insan ka haal yeh hai kay uska Rubb jab usko aazmaish mein daalta hai aur usey izzat aur niyamat deta hai to woh kehta hai kay mere Rubb ne mujhey izzatdar bana diya
Aur jab woh usko azmaish mein daalta hai aur uska rizq uspar tangg kar deta hai to woh kehta hai mere Rubb ne mujhey zaleel kar diya
Hargiz nahin, balke tum yateem se izzat ka sulook nahin kartey
Aur miskeen ko khana khilane par ek dusrey ko nahin uksatey
Aur Miras(inheritance) ka sara maal sameith kar kha jatey ho
Aur maal ki muhabbat mei buri tarah giraftar ho
Hargiz nahin jab zameen pai dar pai qoot qoot kar regzaar bana di jayegi
Aur tumahra Rubb jalwa farma hoga is haal mei kay farishtey saff dar saff khade hongey
Aur jahannum us roz samnay le aayi jaeygi, us din Insan ko samajh ayegi aur us waqt us ke samajhne ka kya hasil
Woh kahega ke kaash maine apni is zindagi ke liye kuch peshgi saman kiya hota
Phir us din Allah jo azaab dega waisa azaab dene wala koi nahin
Aur Allah jaisa bandhega waisa bandhne wala koi nahin
(Dusri taraf irshad hoga) Aey nafsey mutmain(reassured soul/pious)
Chal apne Rubb ki taraf is haal mein ke tu (apne anjam-e-neik se) khush (Aur apne Rubb kay nazdeek) pasandida hai
Shamil ho ja mere (neik) bandon mein
Aur dakhil hoja meri jannat mein
Nahin mai kasam khata hoon is shehar(city) ki
Aur haal yeh hai ke (Aey nabi) is shehar mein tumko halal kar liya gaya hai
Aur kasam khata hoon baap(Adam) ki aur us aulad ki jo ussey paida hui
Dar haqeeqat humne Insan ko mushakkat mein paida kiya hai
Kya usne yeh samajh rakhha hai kay uspar koi qaabu na paa sakega
Kehta hai ke maine dhairon maal udaa diya
Kya woh samajhta hai kay kisi ne usko nahin dekha
Kya humne usey do aankhein
Aur ek zubaan aur do honth nahin diye
Aur dono numayan raste usey (nahin) dikha diye
Magar usne dushwar guzar ghati(steep) se guzarne ki himmat na ki
Aur tum kya jaano kay kya hai woh dushwar guzar ghaati
Kisi gardan ko gulami se chudana
Ya faake ke din
kisi qareebi yateem
Ya khaak nasheen miskeen ko khana khilana
Phir (iske saath yeh kay) aadmi un logon mein shamil ho jo imaan laye aur jinhon ne ek dusrey ko sabr aur (khalq-e-khuda par) raham ki talqeen ki
Yeh log hain dayein baazu(right hand) waley
Aur jinhon ne hamari aayat ko mann-ney se inkar kiya woh bayen bazu(left hand) waley hain
Un par aag chaayi hui hogi
Suraj aur uski dhoop ki kasam
Aur Chand ki kasam jabke wo uske pichey aata hai
Aur din ki kasam jabke woh (Suraj ko) numaya kar deta hai
Aur raat ki kasam jabke woh (suraj ko) dhank leti hai
Aur aasman ki aur us zaat ki kasam jisne usey qayam kiya
Aur zameen ki aur us zaat ki kasam jisne usey bichaya
Aur nafs-e-Insani ki aur us zaat ki kasam jisne usey hamwar kiya
Phir uski badi aur uski parhezgari uss par ilham kar di
Yaqeenan falah pa gaya woh jisne nafs ka tazkiya kiya
Aur na-murad hua woh jisne usko daba diya
Samood ne apni sarkashi ki bina par jhutlaya
Jab us qaum ka sab se zyada shaqi (Badnaseeb) aadmi biphar kar utha
To Allah ke Rasool ne un logon se kaha ke khabardar Allah ki ountni (she-camel) ko (haath na lagana) aur uske paani peene (mein maane na hona)
Magar unhon ne uski baat ko jhuta qarar diya aur ountni ko maar dala. Aakhir-e-kaar unke gunah ke padash mein unke Rubb ne unpar aisi aafat toodi ke ek saath sab ko paywand-e-khaaq kar diya
Aur usey (apne is fail kay) kisi burey natije ka koi khauf(darr) nahin hai
Kasam hai raat ki jabke woh chaa jaaye
Aur din ki jabke woh roshan ho
Aur us zaat ki jisne nar(male) aur maada(female) ko paida kiya
Dar haqeeqat tum logon ki koshishein mukhtalif qism ki hai
To jisne (rah e khuda mein) maal diya aur (khuda ki nafarmani se) parhez kiya
Aur bhalayi ko sach mana
Usko hum aasan raastey kay liye sahulat denge
Aur jisne bukhl(kanjoosi) kiya aur (apney khuda se) be niyazi(self-sufficient/independent) barti
aur bhalayi ko jhutlaya
Usko hum sakht rastey kay liye sahulat dengey
Aur uska maal aakhir uske kis kaam aayega jabke woh halaq ho jaye
Beshak rasta batana hamare zimmey hai
aur dar haqeeqat aakhirat aur duniya dono kay hum hi malik hai
Pas maine tumko khabardar kar diya hai bhadakti hui aag se
Usmein nahin jhulsega magar woh intihayi badbakth
jisne jhutlaya aur mooh phera
Aur usse door rakkha jayega woh nihayat parhezgaar
Jo paakiza honay ki khatir apna maal deta hai
Uspar kisi ka koi ehsan nahin hai jiska badla usey dena ho
Woh to sirf apne Rubb-e-bartrar ki raza joii ke liye yeh kaam karta hai
Aur zaroor woh (us se) khush hoga
Kasam hai rozey roshan ki
Aur raat ki jabke woh sukoon ke saath taari ho jaye
(Aey nabi) tumharey Rubb ne tumko hargiz nahin chodha aur na woh naraaz hua
Aur yaqeenan tumhare liya baad ka daur pehle daur se behtar hai
Aur anqareeb tumhra Rubb tumko itna dega ke tum khush ho jaogey
Kya usne tumko yateem nahin paya aur phir thikana faraham kiya
Aur tumhey nawaqif-e-raah paya aur phir hidayat bakshi
Aur tumhein nadaar(in want) paya aur phir maldar kar diya
Lihaza yateem par sakhti na karo
Aur saayil(maangne waley) ko na jhidko
Aur apne Rubb ki niyamt ka izhar karo
(Aey Nabi) kya humne tumhara seena tumhare liye khol nahin diya
Aur tumpar se woh bhari bojh utar diya
Jo tumhari qamar todhe daal raha tha
Aur tumhare khatir tumharey zikr ka awazah buland kar diya
Pas haqeeqat yeh hai kay tangi kay saat farakhi bhi hai
Beshak tangi kay saath farakhi bhi hai
Lihaza jab tum faarig ho to Ibadat ki mushakkat mei lag jao
Aur apne Rubb ki taraf raagib ho
Kasam hai Injir(fig) ki aur Zaitun ki
Aur Tur-e-sina (Mount Sinai)
Aur is pur-aman shehar (Makkah) ki
Humne Insan ko behtarin saakht par paida kiya
Phir usey ulta pher kar humne sab neechon se neech kar diya
Siwaye un logon ke jo iman laye aur neik amal karte rahey kay unke liye kabhi khatam na hone wala ajar hai
Pas (aey nabi) iske baad kaun jaza o saza ke maamle mei tumko jhutla sakta hai
Kya Allah sab hakimon se bada hakim nahin hai
Padho (Aey Nabi) apne Rubb ke naam ke saath Jisne paida kiya
Jamey huey khoon ke ek lothdey se Insan ki takhliq ki
Padho aur tumhara Rubb bada kareem hai
jisne qalam ke zariya se ilm sikhaya
Insan ko woh ilm diya jisey woh na jaanta tha
Hargiz nahin, Insan sarkahshi karta hai
Is bina par ke woh apne aap ko be niyaz dekhta hai
(halaanke) palatna yaqeenan tere Rubb hi ki taraf hai
Tumne dekha us shaks ko
Jo ek banday ko mana karta hai jabke woh namaz padta ho
Tumhara kya khayal hai agar (woh banda) raah e raast par ho
ya parhezgari ki talqeen karta ho
Tumhara kya khayal hai agar (yeh mana karne wala shakhs haqq ko) jhutlata aur mooh moadta ho
Kya woh nahin jaanta ke Allah dekh raha hai
Hargiz nahin agar woh baaz na aaya to hum uski peshani ke baal pakad kar usey khinchey ge
Us peshani ko jo jhooti aur sakth khatakaar hai
Woh bulaley apne haamiyon ki toli ko
Hum bhi azaab ke farishton ko bula lengey
Hargiz nahin, uski baat na mano aur sajda karo aur (apne Rubb ka) qurb hasil karo
Humne is (Quran) ko shab-e-qadr mei nazil kiya hai
Aur tum kya jano kay shab-e-qadr kya hai
Shab-e-qadr hazar mahino se zyada behtar hai
Farishtey aur rooh(Jibrael) us mein apne Rubb ke izn(permission) se har hukm le kar utarte hai
Woh raat sarasar salamati hai tulu e fajr tak
Ehle kitab aur Mushrikin mein se jo log kafir thay (woh apne kufr se) baaz aane walay na thay jab tak ke unke paas dalil e roshan na aa jaye
(Yani) Allah ke taraf se ek Rasool jo paak sahife padh kar sunaye
Jin mein bilkul raast aur durust tehrirein likhi hui ho
Pehle jin logon ko kitab di gayi thi unmei tafarqa barpa(split/divide) nahin hua magar is ke baad ke un ke paas (raahe rast ka) bayan e wazeh aa chuka tha

Aur unko iske siwa koi hukum nahin diya gaya tha ke Allah ke bandagi karein apne deen ko uske liye khalis karke. Bilkul yaksu ho kar, Aur namaz qayam karein aur zakat de yahi nihayat sahih-o-durust deen hai
Ehle kitaab aur mushrikin mein se jin logon ne kufr kiya hai woh yaqeenan jahannam ki aag mein jayenge aur hamesha us mein rahenge, yeh log badh-tareen e khalayek(creation) hain
Jo log iman le aaye aur jinhon nay neik amal kiye woh yaqeenan behtareen-e-khalayeq hai

Unki jaza unke Rubb ke yahan dayimi(eternal) qayam ki jannatein hain jinke nichey nehrein beh rahi hongi. Woh unmein hamesha hamesh rahenge. Allah unse razi hua aur woh Allah se razi huey. Yeh kuch hai us shaks ke liye jisne apne Rubb ka khauf kiya ho
Jab zameen apni puri shiddat kay saath hila daali jayegi
Aur zameen apne andar kay sarey bojh nikal kar bahar daal degi
Aur Insan kahega ke yeh isko kya ho raha hai
Us roz woh apne (upar guzre huey) halaat bayan karegi
Kyunke tere Rubb ne usey (aisa karne ka) hukm diya hoga
Us roz log mutafarrik halat mein paltenge taakay unke aamal unko dikhaey jayein
Phir jisne zarra barabar neki ki hogi woh usko dekh lega
Aur jisne zarra barabar badi ki hogi woh usko dekh lega
Kasam hai un (ghodon) ki jo phunkare marte hue dhaudte hai
Phir (apne tapon se) chingariyan jhaadte hain
Phir subah sawere chapa marte hain
Phir is mauke par gard o gubar udatey hai
Phir isi halat mei kisi majmey ke andar ja ghustey hai
Haqiqat yeh hai ke Insan apne Rubb ka bada nashukra hai
Aur woh khud is par gawah hai
Aur woh maal-o-daulat ki muhabbat mei buri tarah mubtala hai
To kya woh us waqt ko nahin janta jab qabron mein jo kuch (madfun) hai usey nikal liya jayega
Aur seeno mein jo kuch (makhfi) hai usey baramad karke uski jaanch padtal ki jayegi
Yaqeenan unka Rubb us roz unse khoob bakhabar hoga
Azeem hadisa
Kya hai woh azeem hadisa
Tum kya jano ke woh azeem hadisa kya hai
woh din jab log bhikre huey parwano ki tarah
Aur pahad rang bi rangi dhunki hui oon ke tarah hongey
Phir jiske palade bhari hongey
Woh dil pasand aish mei hoga
Aur jis kay palade halke hongey
Uski jaye qarar gehri khayi hogi
Aur tumhein kya khabar kay woh kya cheez hai
Bhadakti hui Aag
Tum logon ko zyada se zyada aur ek dusre se badh kar duniya hasil karne ki dhun ne gaflat mei daal rakha hai
Yahan tak ke (isi fikr mei) tum lab-e-gaur tak pahunch jatey ho
Hargiz nahin, ankareeb tumko maloom ho jayega
phir (sunlo kay) hargiz nahin, ankarib tumko maloom ho jayega
Hargiz nahin agar tum yaqeeni ilm ki haisiyat se (is rawish ke anjam ko) jantey hotey (to tumhara yeh tarze amal na hota)
Tum dozakh dekh kar rahogey
Phir (sun lo ke) tum bilkul yaqeen kay saath usey dekh logey
Phir zaroor us roz tum se in neyamaton kay barey mein jawab talabi ki jayegi
Zamane ki qasam
Insan dar haqeeqat badey khasarey(nuksaan) mein hai
Siwaye un logon ke jo iman laye aur neik aamal karte rahe aur ek dusrey ko haqq ki nasihat aur sabr ki talqeen karte rahe
Tabahi hai har us shaks ke liye jo (moonh dar moonh) logon par taan aur (peeth peechey) buraiyan karne ka khugar hai
Jisne maal jama kiya aur usey gin gin kar rakkha
Woh samajhta hai ke us ka maal hamesha uske paas rahega
Hargiz nahin, woh shaks to chakna-chur kar dene wali jagah mein phenk diya jayega
Aur tum kya jano ke kya hai woh chakna-chur kar dene wali jagah
Allah ki aag khoob bhadkayi hui
Jo dilon tak pahunchey gi
Woh un par dhaank kar bandh kar di jayegi
(Is halat mei ke woh) unchey unchey sutuno mei (ghirey huey hongey)
Tumne dekha nahin ke tumhare Rubb ne haathi walon ke saath kya kiya
Kya usne unki tadbir ko akarat nahin kar diya
Aur un par parindo ke jhund ke jhund bhej diye
Jo un par pakey huey mitti ke patthar phenk rahey thay
Phir un ka yeh haal kar diya jaise janwaron ka khaya hua bhoosa
Chunke Quresh manoos huey
(yani) Jaadey(winter) aur garmi ke safaron se manoos
Lihaza un ko chahiye ke is ghar ke Rubb ki ibadat karein
Jisne unhein bhook se bacha kar khane ko diya aur khauf se bacha kar aman ata kiya
Tum ne dekha us shaks ko jo aakhirat ki jaza va saza ko jhutlata hai
Wahi to hai jo yateem ko dhakkey deta hai
Aur miskeen ka khana dene par nahin uksata
Phir tabahi hai un namaz padhne walon ke liye
Jo apni namaz se gaflat barat-tey hain
Jo riya-kaari(dikhawa) karte hai
Aur maamuli zarurat ki cheezen (logon ko) dene se gurez karte hai
(Aey Nabi ) Hum ne tumhein kausar ata kar diya
Pas tum apne Rubb hi ke liye namaz padho aur qurbani karo
Tumhara dushman hi jadh-kata hai
Kehdo ke aey kafiron
Main unki ibadat nahin karta jinki ibadat tum karte ho
Aur na tum uski ibadat karne wale ho jiski ibadat mai karta hoon
Aur na mai unki ibadat karne wala hoon jinki ibadat tum ne ki hai
Aur na tum uski ibadat karne waley ho jiski ibadat main karta hoon
Tumhare liye tumhara deen hai aur mere liye mera deen
Jab Allah ki madad aa jaye aur fatah naseeb ho jaye
Aur (aey Nabi s.a.s) tum dekh lo ke log fauj dar fauj Allah ke deen mein dakhil ho rahey hain
To apne Rubb ki hamd ke saath uski tasbeeh karo Aur us se magfirat ki duaa maango. Beshak woh bada tauba qabool karne wala hai
Toot gaye Abu Lahab ke haath aur na-murad ho gaya woh
Uska maal aur jo kuch us ne kamaya woh uske kisi kaam na aaya
Zaroor woh shola zan Aag mei dala jayega
Aur (us ke saath) us ki joru(wife) bhi lagai bujhai karne wali
Us ki gardan(neck) mein moonj ki rassi hogi
Kaho woh Allah hai, Yakta
Allah sab se bay-niyaz hai aur sab us kay mohtaj hain
Na uski koi aulad hai aur na woh kisi ki aulad
Aur koi uska humsar nahin hai
Kaho main panaah maangta hoon subah ke Rubb ki
Har us cheez ke shar se jo usne paida ki hai
Aur raat ki tareeki ke sharr se jab ke woh chaa jaye
Aur girhon mein phoonkne walon (ya waliyon) ke sharr se
Aur hasid(envies) ke sharr se jab ke woh hasad(envy) karey
Kaho, main panah maangta hoon insano ke Rubb
Insano ke badshah
Insano ke hakiki maabood ki
us waswasa dalne wale ke shar se jo baar baar palat kar aata hai
Jo logon ke dilon mei waswasey daalta hai
khwah woh jinno mein se ho ya Insano mein se
